description.value: As a Free Action, the Sister can spend a Fate Point to ignore the effects of Fatigue until the end of the encounter. On doing so every other firendly character within 30m removes 1 Fatigue.

system.benefit: As a Free Action, the Sister can spend a Fate Point to ignore the effects of Fatigue until the end of the encounter. On doing so every other firendly character within 30m removes 1 Fatigue.

prerequisites.text: Tier 1: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Willpower 45
